1.content:
One of these characters is wandering through the Dragon Pens, cleaning and replacing the feeding troughs, when they suddenly zap and flash away in a flash of light!

When they wake up, they’ve shrunk!
1.title: Character selection!

14.content: it's always nice to know, after all.
14.title: before the befriending of dragons or after?

142.content:
on a rather boring day, astrid decides to head down to the colosseum to clean out stormfly's pen. The walk through the serene environments was always a highlight of her day, allowing her worries to melt away as she readies herself for the stench of her dragons pen.

she arrives and sits down for a second, thinking wistfully before preparing herself and entering her beloved friend's pen, it doesn't take long before she enters, seeing her dragon's head cock as a weird sensation strikes her, she doesn't know exactly, but is the ground closer?

"Hey stormfly." she says, moving over to the dragon, patting her and feeding her a chicken leg, though the feeling didn't leave, and before long the ground gets closer again.

the question is, how much closer are we talking?
142.title: the stables, your size is not unfortunately

info.brief_description: A story about any HTTYD character, shrinking, and having to deal with it. Vore preferred.
info.description:
As the title says! A character from HTTYD shrinks down to the size smaller than a doll, and has to find a way to survive.

Almost anything goes! I’d love to see submissions. :D we need more HTTYD stuff like this.
info.pretty_title: How To Train Your Dragon; shrinking!
